name: Helderberg College
academic_year: January to November (January-March and April-June, with a one week mid-term break; Midyear break; July-September and September-November, with a one week mid-term break).
accrediting_agency: Council on Higher Education (CHE); Department of Higher Education and Training (DHET); South African Qualifications Authority (SAQA); Adventist Accrediting Association (AAA)
